constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 操作次数限制，Bob 必须在 n 次操作中至少选择 m 次加法操作

constraints.name: range_bound
constraints.description: 选取元素的值域约束，Alice 选择的数必须在 [0, k] 范围内

constraints.name: optimal_play
constraints.description: 最优策略约束，Alice 和 Bob 都会采取最优策略来最大化或最小化最终得分
constraints.formal: Alice and Bob play optimally to maximize or minimize the final score

constraints.name: turn_based
constraints.description: 回合制约束，游戏由 n 个回合组成，每个回合 Alice 选择一个数，Bob 决定加或减
constraints.formal: game consists of n turns, each turn Alice picks a number and Bob decides to add or subtract it
